Has anyone run JUnit 4 tests under one of the Java-5-ready
eclipses (e.g. 3.1-final, 3.1.1-rc1, 3.2-M1)? If so,

How painless is it? Specifically, 

* What did you to to make Eclipse use the new JUnit?

* Do Run>JUnit and Run>JUnit Plug-in Test runners work as before?

* Any other notable tweaks?
